#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

int main()
{
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n;
		cin>>n;
		ll a[n];
		ll sum = 0;
		ll finalJ = -1;
		for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			sum+=a[i];
		}
		ll temp = 0;
		ll j1;
		for(ll j1=0;j1<=50;j1++)
		{
			temp = 0;
			for(ll k=0;k<n;k++)
			{
				temp+=(j1+k);
			}
			if(temp==sum)
			{
				finalJ = j1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(finalJ==-1)
			cout<<"-1\n";
		else
		{
			ll tempS = 0;
			ll b[n];
			ll dif[n];
			for(ll j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				b[j] = j+finalJ;
				dif[j] = a[j] - b[j];
			}
			for(ll j = 0;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(dif[j]>0)
				{	
					tempS+=dif[j];
				}
			}
			cout<<tempS<<endl;
		}

	}
	return 0;
}
